Class UIMenuFile

java.lang.Object

public class UIMenuFile
extends UIMenu
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, IUIConstants, ICoreConstants

This class creates the file menu.

Parameters:
menu, - the menu to add the options to.

rosterEntries, - the roster entries to create menu items for.
